Disallow the use ofarguments.callerorarguments.callee
Table of ContentsRule DetailsVersionResources
The use ofarguments.callerandarguments.calleemake several code optimizations impossible. They have been deprecated in future versions of JavaScript and their use is forbidden in ECMAScript 5 while in strict mode.
